thread.title: Sharon

author: Sharon
title: Sharon
text: I ordered 3 items...totally wish I hadn't . When the items finally arrived-they took ages..they were too late for the occasion. Not only were they late,the sizes need to be seen to be believed -no idea how their sizing works..I had used their guides..but they were totally unreliable.I wanted to return all 3 items, but they wouldn't provide a return code for more than 1. I messaged them,told them I was not prepared to send each item back individually - sent all 3 back in one parcel at a cost of over £9, tonight they messaged that they will refund for the 1 they had given a return code for..no mention of the other items which they have to have received too.They owe me well over £40, but tell me they're refunding just over £16. Diabolical service..no matter how tempting things look,avoid this company.
